title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when a manual build is required.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click on any file in the project.
3. Observe that the 'Build' action is always enabled, regardless of whether a build is needed or not.
